typography.headingStyle: Large bold sans-serif, stacked multi-line with color accent (teal on first word)
typography.bodyStyle: Regular weight sans-serif, light gray on dark background

components.description: Three-line stacked heading with 'ENUTS.' in teal, 'PRIVATE. SIMPLE.' in white
components.notable: Color differentiation emphasizes the brand name

components.description: Dark semi-transparent container with alpha test signup form
components.notable: Contained signup flow with risk acknowledgment checkbox

design.visualHierarchy: Dramatic centered composition with animated starfield background guiding focus to hero text, then down to modal
innovativeElements: Glassmorphic modal card on dark background

flow.userIntent: Understand product value proposition and join alpha test
exitPoints: Join TestFlight button leads to external signup

interactiveElements.action: Initiates signup process for alpha access

flow.informationArchitecture: Single focal point: value prop headline â†’ explanation copy â†’ gated signup form
frictionPoints: Checkbox must be checked before signup
External flow (TestFlight) may require app switching

copy.headline: ENUTS. PRIVATE. SIMPLE.
copy.subheadline: eNuts is back. Completely rebuilt from the ground up to bring you private, simple Bitcoin payments with an intuitive UX.

microcopy.text: I acknowledge that eNuts is alpha software and I will be using it at my own risk

typography.headingStyle: Bold sans-serif, white text on dark
typography.bodyStyle: Regular sans-serif, light gray on dark background

components.description: Top bar with error title and status code
components.notable: Minimal, functional design for error state

components.description: Developer-focused error explanation with code snippets
components.notable: Includes emoji (waving hand), treats error as teaching moment

design.visualHierarchy: Error title prominent at top, developer message below with technical guidance
innovativeElements: Developer-friendly error messaging with implementation suggestions

flow.userIntent: Understand what went wrong and how to proceed
flow.informationArchitecture: Linear top-to-bottom: error code â†’ title â†’ explanation â†’ guidance
frictionPoints: No visible call-to-action or navigation options

microcopy.text: You can provide a way better UX than this when your app throws errors by providing your own ErrorBoundary or errorElement prop on your route.
microcopy.purpose: Educate developer on proper error handling implementation
